game.title: The Lost Sword
game.objective: Find the lost sword and return it to its rightful owner.
game.description: You have been entrusted with the task of finding the legendary Lost Sword. It is said to be hidden deep within the Enchanted Forest, guarded by powerful creatures. Only a true hero can retrieve it and restore peace to the land.
game.reward: 1000 gold coins, a powerful weapon, and the gratitude of the kingdom

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the Enchanted Forest
task.description: Ask the villagers for information about the Enchanted Forest's location. They might have seen something unusual or know someone who can help.

task.objective: Defeat the guardian creatures in the Enchanted Forest
task.description: Navigate through the Enchanted Forest and defeat the guardian creatures that stand in your way. Beware of their powerful magic and cunning tactics.

Explore the deepest parts of the Enchanted Forest and search for the hidden chamber where the Lost Sword is believed to be kept. Use all your skills and resources to overcome any obstacles in your path.

task.objective: Return the Lost Sword to King Arthur
task.description: Once you have retrieved the Lost Sword, make your way back to the kingdom and present it to King Arthur. He will reward you generously and praise your heroic deeds.
